concept.title: resource adapter is not working
concept.shortdesc: A number of tools are provided within and within that you can use to help with problem determination and troubleshooting.

conbody.p: When troubleshooting resource adapter problems, a number of tools are provided in that you can use to diagnose the problem:

ul.li: Log files. System logs are generated to help with problem determination and troubleshooting. For more information about log files, see Log files.
Common problems. There are a number of common problems that you might encounter. For more information about common problems, see Common problems.
Message catalog. Use the messages in this catalog to help you solve problems with . For more information about message catalog, see Message catalog.

conbody.p: For more information about troubleshooting in including problem determination tools that are provided with the product, see Troubleshooting and support in the documentation.
